Message:
“...Many are dead
because of a weapon
I made.”

After saying that,
Artie knocked
my hand away.

The way I see it though,
as someone who’s known
war their entire life,
death was inevitable.

That’s why I might not
be able to truly understand
the despair she’s feeling.

I’ve seen firsthand
just how many lives
weapons that protect
have saved.

Those heroic hands
that saved the lives
of many.

Then, I held out
the sword and letters
that those children
entrusted to me to deliver.

“Thanks to this sword,
everyone survived.
Here’s your proof.”
